snippet: Ron Robin’s “The Cold World They Made” is a provocative examination of Albert and Roberta Wohlstetter, whose views influenced policy makers in the 1950s....
lead_paragraph: Ron Robin’s “The Cold World They Made” is a provocative examination of Albert and Roberta Wohlstetter, whose views influenced policy makers in the 1950s.

headline.main: Meet the Couple Who Helped Shape America’s Nuclear War Policy

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: The Cold World They Made: The Strategic Legacy of Roberta and Albert Wohlstetter (Book)
